9/*=====================================================================
10 * PLEASE GO READ THE DOCUMENTATION!
11 * ------------------------------------------------
12 * $tarball_directory/doc/doxygen-doc/
13 * or
14 * https://www.open-mpi.org/projects/hwloc/doc/
15 *=====================================================================
16 *
17 * FAIR WARNING: Do NOT expect to be able to figure out all the
18 * subtleties of hwloc by simply reading function prototypes and
19 * constant descrptions here in this file.
20 *
21 * Hwloc has wonderful documentation in both PDF and HTML formats for
22 * your reading pleasure. The formal documentation explains a LOT of
23 * hwloc-specific concepts, provides definitions, and discusses the
24 * "big picture" for many of the things that you'll find here in this
25 * header file.
26 *
27 * The PDF/HTML documentation was generated via Doxygen; much of what
28 * you'll see in there is also here in this file. BUT THERE IS A LOT
29 * THAT IS IN THE PDF/HTML THAT IS ***NOT*** IN hwloc.h!
30 *
31 * There are entire paragraph-length descriptions, discussions, and
32 * pretty pictures to explain subtle corner cases, provide concrete
33 * examples, etc.
34 *
35 * Please, go read the documentation. :-)
36 *
37 * Moreover there are several examples of hwloc use under doc/examples
38 * in the source tree.
39 *
40 *=====================================================================*/
41

200#define HWLOC_OBJ_TYPE_MIN HWLOC_OBJ_MACHINE /* Sentinel value */
203 HWLOC_OBJ_MACHINE,
212 HWLOC_OBJ_PACKAGE,
218 HWLOC_OBJ_CORE,
222 HWLOC_OBJ_PU,
234 HWLOC_OBJ_L1CACHE,

237 HWLOC_OBJ_L4CACHE,

413HWLOC_DECLSPEC int hwloc_compare_types (hwloc_obj_type_t type1, hwloc_obj_type_t type2) __hwloc_attribute_const;

416#define HWLOC_TYPE_UNORDERED INT_MAX
417
426union hwloc_obj_attr_u;
427
432struct hwloc_obj {
433 /* physical information */
434 hwloc_obj_type_t type;
435 char *subtype;
437 unsigned os_index;
442#define HWLOC_UNKNOWN_INDEX (unsigned)-1
443
444 char *name;
449 hwloc_uint64_t total_memory;
451 union hwloc_obj_attr_u *attr;
454 /* global position */
455 int depth;
470 unsigned logical_index;
477 /* cousins are all objects of the same type (and depth) across the entire topology */
478 struct hwloc_obj *next_cousin;
479 struct hwloc_obj *prev_cousin;
481 /* children of the same parent are siblings, even if they may have different type and depth */
482 struct hwloc_obj *parent;
483 unsigned sibling_rank;
484 struct hwloc_obj *next_sibling;
485 struct hwloc_obj *prev_sibling;
488 unsigned arity;
492 struct hwloc_obj **children;
493 struct hwloc_obj *first_child;
494 struct hwloc_obj *last_child;
497 int symmetric_subtree;
508 unsigned memory_arity;
511 struct hwloc_obj *memory_first_child;
526 unsigned io_arity;
529 struct hwloc_obj *io_first_child;
538 unsigned misc_arity;
541 struct hwloc_obj *misc_first_child;
547 /* cpusets and nodesets */
548 hwloc_cpuset_t cpuset;
563 hwloc_cpuset_t complete_cpuset;
576 hwloc_nodeset_t nodeset;
598 hwloc_nodeset_t complete_nodeset;
614 struct hwloc_info_s *infos;
615 unsigned infos_count;
617 /* misc */
618 void *userdata;
623 hwloc_uint64_t gp_index;
628};
632typedef struct hwloc_obj * hwloc_obj_t;
633
635union hwloc_obj_attr_u {
637 struct hwloc_numanode_attr_s {
638 hwloc_uint64_t local_memory;
639 unsigned page_types_len;
645 struct hwloc_memory_page_type_s {
646 hwloc_uint64_t size;
647 hwloc_uint64_t count;
648 } * page_types;
649 } numanode;
650
652 struct hwloc_cache_attr_s {
653 hwloc_uint64_t size;
654 unsigned depth;
655 unsigned linesize;
656 int associativity;
658 hwloc_obj_cache_type_t type;
659 } cache;
661 struct hwloc_group_attr_s {
662 unsigned depth;
664 unsigned kind;
665 unsigned subkind;
666 unsigned char dont_merge;
667 } group;
669 struct hwloc_pcidev_attr_s {
670#ifndef HWLOC_HAVE_32BITS_PCI_DOMAIN
671 unsigned short domain;
673#else
674 unsigned int domain;
676#endif
677 unsigned char bus;
678 unsigned char dev;
679 unsigned char func;
680 unsigned short class_id;
681 unsigned short vendor_id;
682 unsigned short device_id;
683 unsigned short subvendor_id;
684 unsigned short subdevice_id;
685 unsigned char revision;
686 float linkspeed;
692 } pcidev;
694 struct hwloc_bridge_attr_s {
695 union {
696 struct hwloc_pcidev_attr_s pci;
697 } upstream;
698 hwloc_obj_bridge_type_t upstream_type;
699 union {
700 struct {
701#ifndef HWLOC_HAVE_32BITS_PCI_DOMAIN
702 unsigned short domain;
704#else
705 unsigned int domain;
707#endif
708 unsigned char secondary_bus;
709 unsigned char subordinate_bus;
710 } pci;
711 } downstream;
712 hwloc_obj_bridge_type_t downstream_type;
713 unsigned depth;
714 } bridge;
716 struct hwloc_osdev_attr_s {
717 hwloc_obj_osdev_type_t type;
718 } osdev;
719};
720
725struct hwloc_info_s {
726 char *name;
727 char *value;
728};
729
